title: Track Awesome Pinned Gists Updates Weekly
_seo_title: Track Awesome Pinned Gists (matchai/awesome-pinned-gists) Updates Weekly - Track Awesome List
description: üìå‚ú® A collection of awesome dynamic pinned gists for GitHub

items.title: Awesome Pinned Gists Updates on May 05 - May 11, 2025
items.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on May 05 - May 11, 2025
items.content_text:
### GitHub

*   [activity-box (‚≠ê222)](https://github.com/JasonEtco/activity-box) - Update a pinned gist to contain the latest activity of a GitHub user.
    *   [github-activity-box (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/maxchang3/github-activity-box) - A TypeScript rewrite of activity-box, published on npm for easy GitHub Actions integration, with improved type safety, customizability, and using the GraphQL API to retrieve issues and PRs authored by the specified user.
*   [lang-box (‚≠ê56)](https://github.com/inokawa/lang-box) - Update a pinned gist to contain languages of your recent commits in GitHub
    *   [recent-languages-box (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/liby/recent-languages-box) - A TypeScript + Bun rewrite of lang-box that updates a pinned gist with your recent GitHub commit language statistics. It offers improved type safety, customizability, and uses a more scientific approach to sorting languages.
    *   [github-lang-box (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/maxchang3/github-lang-box) - A TypeScript rewrite of lang-box, published on npm for easy GitHub Actions integration, with improved type safety, customizability, and private repository access.
items.content_html:
GitHub

  • activity-box (‚≠ê222) - Update a pinned gist to contain the latest activity of a GitHub user.
    • github-activity-box (‚≠ê3) - A TypeScript rewrite of activity-box, published on npm for easy GitHub Actions integration, with improved type safety, customizability, and using the GraphQL API to retrieve issues and PRs authored by the specified user.
  • lang-box (‚≠ê56) - Update a pinned gist to contain languages of your recent commits in GitHub
    • recent-languages-box (‚≠ê0) - A TypeScript + Bun rewrite of lang-box that updates a pinned gist with your recent GitHub commit language statistics. It offers improved type safety, customizability, and uses a more scientific approach to sorting languages.
    • github-lang-box (‚≠ê3) - A TypeScript rewrite of lang-box, published on npm for easy GitHub Actions integration, with improved type safety, customizability, and private repository access.

items.title: Awesome Pinned Gists Updates on Jan 02 - Jan 08, 2023
items.summary: 22 awesome projects updated on Jan 02 - Jan 08, 2023
items.content_text:
### External Services

*   [bilibili-box (‚≠ê18)](https://github.com/KeJunMao/bilibili-box) - Update a pinned gist to contain your latest Bilibili videos.
*   [blog-box (‚≠ê6)](https://github.com/Aveek-Saha/blog-box) - Update a pinned gist to show your latest dev.to blog post.
*   [book-box (‚≠ê21)](https://github.com/amorriscode/book-box) - Update a pinned gist to contain your latest reads from goodreads
*   [chess-com-box-py (‚≠ê13)](https://github.com/sciencepal/chess-com-box-py) - Update a pinned gist to contain your Chess.com Ratings.
*   Code::Stats (<https://codestats.net/>)
    *   [codestats-box (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/Ancientwood/codestats-box) - Update a pinned gist to contain your daily Code::Stats.
    *   [codestats-box-python (‚≠ê10)](https://github.com/aksh1618/codestats-box-python) - A Python implementation of codestats-box. Update a pinned gist to contain your Code::Stats stats.
*   [covid-box (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/puf17640/covid-box) - Update a gist to contain global or country specific coronavirus stats.
*   [douban-box (‚≠ê14)](https://github.com/CodeDaraW/douban-box) - Update a pinned gist to contain the latest user status about books/movies/music from Douban.
*   [goodreads-box (‚≠ê26)](https://github.com/mdluo/goodreads-box) - Update a pinned gist to show your currently reading books and progress on Goodreads.
*   [hitokoto-box (‚≠ê10)](https://github.com/greenhandatsjtu/hitokoto-box) - Update a pinned gist to contain a random hitokoto.
*   [mal-box (‚≠ê4)](https://github.com/jckli/mal-box) - Update a pinned gist to contain your latest activity from MyAnimeList.
*   [medium-stat-box (‚≠ê39)](https://github.com/kylemocode/medium-stat-box) - Update a pinned gist to show your medium stats and latest articles.
*   [movie-box (‚≠ê23)](https://github.com/LuisAlejandro/movie-box) - Update a pinned gist to contain your media center stats from Trakt.tv.
*   [neko-box (‚≠ê31)](https://github.com/RangerDigital/neko-box) - Update a pinned gist to contain the latest activity from AniList.
*   [shodan-exposure-box (‚≠ê4)](https://github.com/ChrisCarini/shodan-exposure-box) - Update a pinned gist containing the top used ports as observed by [Shodan](https://www.shodan.io/).
*   Spotify (<https://spotify.com/>)
    *   [spotify-box (‚≠ê129)](https://github.com/izayl/spotify-box) - Update a pinned gist to contain your weekly top tracks on Spotify.
    *   [spotify-box (‚≠ê18)](https://github.com/Aveek-Saha/spotify-box) - Update a pinned gist to show your weekly/monthly/all-time top Spotify tracks/artists.
    *   [spotify-gist (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/mporracindie/spotify-gist) - Update a pinned gist to contain your monthly top artist on Spotify.
*   [stackoverflow-stats-box (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/Pudding124/stackoverflow-stats-box) - Update a pinned gist to show stack overflow stats.
*   [strava-box (‚≠ê47)](https://github.com/JohnPhamous/strava-box) - Update a pinned gist to contain your YTD exercise metrics from Strava.
*   [toggl-box (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/tobimori/toggl-box) - Update a pinned gist to contain your weekly Toggl time tracking stats
*   [typeracer-box (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/tobimori/typeracer-box) - Update a pinned gist to contain your latest TypeRacer races
*   WakaTime (<https://wakatime.com/>)
    *   [waka-box (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/matchai/waka-box) - Update a pinned gist to contain your weekly WakaTime stats.
    *   [waka-box-go (‚≠ê170)](https://github.com/YouEclipse/waka-box-go) - A Golang implementation of waka-box. Update a pinned gist to contain your weekly WakaTime stats.
*   [youtube-box (‚≠ê8)](https://github.com/SinaKhalili/youtube-box) - Update a pinned gist to show your latest YouTube videos

### GitHub

*   [productive-box (‚≠ê522)](https://github.com/maxam2017/productive-box) - Update a pinned gist to contain your most productive hours during the day.
items.content_html:

  • bilibili-box (‚≠ê18) - Update a pinned gist to contain your latest Bilibili videos.

  • typeracer-box (‚≠ê11) - Update a pinned gist to contain your latest TypeRacer races
